alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 28 at 4:35AM MST until February 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor, Central Colorado River Basin and Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Upper Gunnison River Valley
